document_data.mainbody:
orvic was a member of the reformed Cult of the Dragon under Severin Silrajin.
When working, Sorvic usually kept around 20 gp on his person.
Sorvic was a cultist and, alongside Maelgot, one of the bodyguards of Talis Kasterel, at his masters side in the Cults occupied hunting lodge in the Greypeak Mountains.
